body_html: Just to be clear, I am able to run any programs with Bazel build. However, when using simple python programs where the tensorflow library is imported, the gpu will not work and I am stuck with using only the cpus.
body_text: Just to be clear, I am able to run any programs with Bazel build. However, when using simple python programs where the tensorflow library is imported, the gpu will not work and I am stuck with using only the cpus.
body: Just to be clear, I am able to run any programs with Bazel build. However, when using simple python programs where the tensorflow library is imported, the gpu will not work and I am stuck with using only the cpus.
